title: Arbora Hilltop Garden Dining Experience at Faber
blurb: Family-friendly oasis nestled in Mount Faber Peak.
description: Arbora is a family-friendly dining destination nestled within the lush greenery of Mount Faber Peak. Refreshed with a brand-new canopy, it offers a cool and breezy atmosphere for all-day casual dining. Open from 11 AM to 9.30 PM daily, Arbora is perfect for family gatherings, featuring a spacious and playful setting where kids can explore while parents relax and enjoy delicious food. The restaurant provides a unique hilltop garden dining experience, making it an ideal spot for families seeking a relaxing and enjoyable meal amidst nature. It's a great place for kids to have fun and for parents to unwind.

title: Arbora Hilltop Garden & Bistro at Mount Faber Peak
blurb: Dine amidst lush greenery with panoramic views.
description: Arbora Hilltop Garden & Bistro offers a unique dining experience surrounded by nature. Enjoy a diverse menu featuring Western and Asian dishes while taking in the breathtaking views from Mount Faber Peak. The restaurant provides a relaxing atmosphere suitable for families and individuals alike. With its scenic location and delicious food, Arbora is the perfect place to unwind and create lasting memories. The bistro features both indoor and outdoor seating, allowing guests to enjoy the garden setting regardless of the weather. The menu includes options for children, making it a family-friendly destination. The restaurant also hosts occasional events and promotions, adding to the overall experience.

title: Mount Faber Peak Dining at Mount Faber
blurb: Dining options at Mount Faber Peak in Singapore.
description: Mount Faber Peak offers a variety of dining experiences with scenic views. Enjoy culinary delights while overlooking the Singapore skyline. The dining options cater to different tastes and preferences, providing a memorable experience for families and individuals alike. From casual meals to fine dining, Mount Faber Peak provides a unique setting for a special occasion or a relaxing meal. The restaurants offer diverse menus featuring local and international cuisine, ensuring a delightful experience for all visitors. Enjoy the panoramic views and create lasting memories with your loved ones at Mount Faber Peak.
full_address: sg (+65) 6361 0088 109 Mount Faber Road, Mount Faber Peak, Singapore 099203
